typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as string,
		{N° Reseau} as string,
		{Libelle Reseau Produit} as string,
		{N° Produit} as string,
		{Libelle long Produit} as string,
		{DDV Produit} as string,
		{DEV Produit} as string,
		{Supprimé ?} as string,
		{Date Suppression} as string,
		{Libellé du Type de support} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceproducts
sourceproducts derive(DDV_Product = iif(length({DDV Produit})==10,toDate(substring({DDV Produit},7,4)+"-"+substring({DDV Produit},4,2)+"-"+substring({DDV Produit},1,2)),toDate(substring({DDV Produit},6,4)+"-"+substring({DDV Produit},3,2)+"-"+"0"+substring({DDV Produit},1,1))),
		DEV_Product = iif(length({DEV Produit})==10,toDate(substring({DEV Produit},7,4)+"-"+substring({DEV Produit},4,2)+"-"+substring({DEV Produit},1,2)),toDate(substring({DEV Produit},6,4)+"-"+substring({DEV Produit},3,2)+"-"+"0"+substring({DEV Produit},1,1))),
		{Supprimé} = iif({Supprimé ?}=='N',0,1),
		{Date Suppression} = iif(length({Date Suppression})==10,toDate(substring({Date Suppression},7,4)+"-"+substring({Date Suppression},4,2)+"-"+substring({Date Suppression},1,2)),toDate(substring({Date Suppression},6,4)+"-"+substring({Date Suppression},3,2)+"-"+"0"+substring({Date Suppression},1,1))),
		supporttypelabel = case({Libellé du Type de support}=="Carte sans contact",899240000, case({Libellé du Type de support}=="Ticket sans contact", 899240001, case({Libellé du Type de support}=="Ticket papier", 899240002,899240003))),
		Unit_Group = "655ae15c-f836-4690-b39a-b2f3828916d5",
		Price_List = "fd17b017-0ad3-ea11-a812-000d3aba7e84",
		Unit = "9cbc6280-1e90-4492-9bfc-71d1d83c1c5a") ~> DerivedColumnTypeConvertions
DerivedColumnTypeConvertions sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
